blogPost.excerpt: Community Fund is an initiative by The Product Folks to help communities with mentorship, funding, and important resources required to go from 0-1.
blogPost.body: Community Fund is an initiative by The Product Folks to help communities with mentorship, funding, and important resources required to go from 0-1.
blogPost.title: Community Fund - An early-stage accelerator to help communities grow from 0-1
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 社区基金是由The Product Folks发起的一项倡议，旨在帮助社区提供从0-1的指导、资金和所需的重要资源。
localize.tagline: 早期加速器，帮助社区从0-1成长起来

localize.description: 社區基金是由The Product Folks發起的一項倡議，旨在幫助社區提供從0-1的指導、資金和所需的重要資源。
localize.tagline: 早期加速器，幫助社區從0-1成長起來

previous.excerpt: A/B Testing and Feature Management across your React Native apps is here. Give your team the flexibility to run experiments and roll-out new features with the Taplytics React Native SDK.
previous.title: Taplytics React Native A/B Testing - A/B Testing and Feature Management for your React Native app

localize.description: 在您的React Native应用中进行A/B测试和功能管理。通过Taplytics React Native SDK，让您的团队可以灵活地进行实验和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 为您的React Native应用进行A/B测试和功能管理。

localize.description: 在您的React Native應用中進行A/B測試和功能管理。通過Taplytics React Native SDK，讓您的團隊可以靈活地進行實驗和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 爲您的React Native應用進行A/B測試和功能管理。

next.excerpt: Playlists come and go, but mixtapes are forever. Paste in your playlist URL and it will automatically be added to the paper mixtape template. Download, print, fold, and hand out some nostalgia.
next.title: Send a Mixtape - Give a digital playlist on a paper crafted cassette

localize.description: 播放列表来来去去，但mixtape是永远的。粘贴你的播放列表URL，它将自动添加到纸质mixtape模板。下载，打印，折叠，并分发一些怀旧。
localize.tagline: 在纸制卡带上赠送一个数字播放列表。

localize.description: 播放列表來來去去，但mixtape是永遠的。粘貼你的播放列表URL，它將自動添加到紙質mixtape模板。下載，打印，摺疊，並分發一些懷舊。
localize.tagline: 在紙製卡帶上贈送一個數字播放列表。
